title: Is PDQ-39 a reliable measure of quality of life of patients at advanced stages of Parkinson's disease considered for Deep Brain Stimulation
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Maria Damianova, Desislava Gancheva, Kaloyan Gabrovski, Petar Karazapryanov, Yoana Milenova, Ivo D. Popivanov, Krasimir Minkin
